```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head = print(df.head())

    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(alt.X('Random Numbers', bin = alt.Bin(maxbins = 30)),
    y = 'count()')

    return [head, histogram]

result = preview_data(data)

result[1]
```
